document_data.mainbody:
Ilistar was a promising mage from Samarach on the Chultan Peninsula who lived some time before the 14 century DR.
Ilistar befriended the mage Selvar who gave her his tome Selvars Ineffable Conjurations, Magicks, and Phantasms before his death. She later became the apprentice of Khelben Arunsun in Waterdeep. Ilistar would eventually add the final spell to Selvars tome, Khelbens warding whip.
